title: 49ers keep both QBs? Top 5 RBs under 25,  Bengals AFC North favorites? All 90's team, and New Team success
itunes:title: 49ers keep both QBs? Top 5 RBs under 25,  Bengals AFC North favorites? All 90's team, and New Team success
description:
The Good Morning Football Podcast begins with TE George Kittle's comments on who starts at QB for the 49ers this season.  Hosts Peter Schrager, Rachel Bonnetta, Adam Rank and Fmr NFL DB DeAngelo Hall debate whether Jimmy Garoppolo and Trey Lance will both be on the San Francisco roster.  Peter continues his Top 5 lists with RB's under the age of 25.  DeAngelo tells us why the Ravens will be favorites over the Bengals in the AFC North.  Adam delivers his all 90's team with a surprise pick at RB before the table gives the player they think will flourish with a new team this season.

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
